concept.title: Gridiron Gambit
concept.description: Become the star running back in Gridiron Gambit, a top-down 2D arcade football game where strategic movement, precise timing, and explosive jukes are key to breaking tackles and scoring the game-winning touchdown.
concept.theme: Classic American Football with a vibrant, slightly stylized aesthetic.
concept.objective: Successfully carry the football from your team's starting position to the opponent's endzone for a touchdown, overcoming defensive players and challenging field conditions.
mechanics: Movement: Agile top-down movement using directional controls to evade defenders.
Tackling System: Enemies will attempt to tackle the player. Players must use evasive maneuvers to avoid contact.
Stamina Management: Sprinting and special moves consume stamina, requiring strategic use of energy.
player_abilities: Juke Move: A quick burst of lateral movement to shake off a defender.
Stiff Arm: A short-range shove to create space or break free from a tackle.
Sprint: A temporary speed boost that consumes stamina.

enemies.name: Linebacker
enemies.behavior: Patrols assigned zones, attempting to tackle any player carrying the ball within their vicinity. Can be lured out of position.

enemies.name: Cornerback
enemies.behavior: Patrols the sidelines, attempting to force the player out of bounds or tackle them. Can make aggressive closing-speed tackles.

enemies.name: Safety
enemies.behavior: Roams the deep field, looking for opportunities to intercept passes (if implemented) or make open-field tackles. Anticipates player movements.

powerups.name: Speed Burst
powerups.effect: Temporarily grants unlimited sprint for a short duration.

powerups.name: Invincibility Aura
powerups.effect: Makes the player temporarily immune to tackles, allowing them to run through defenders.

powerups.name: Stamina Refill
powerups.effect: Instantly replenishes the player's stamina bar.

concept.level_progression: Levels progress by increasing the complexity of the field layout, the number and types of defensive players, and introducing environmental hazards (e.g., slippery patches, wind gusts that affect ball trajectory if passing is added). Each level represents a new drive or a more challenging defensive formation.
concept.scoring_system: Primarily through scoring touchdowns. Bonus points can be awarded for long runs, breaking multiple tackles in a single play, or completing specific challenges within a level (e.g., scoring without losing any stamina).
concept.visual_style: Vibrant, slightly cartoony 2D graphics with clear player sprites, distinct defensive player designs, and detailed field environments. Smooth animations for player movements and tackles.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, energetic soundtrack with classic arcade-style chiptune elements. Satisfying sound effects for tackles, jukes, sprints, and scoring touchdowns. Crowd cheers and announcer snippets to enhance the game atmosphere.

level_design.name: The Training Field
level_design.description: Welcome to Gridiron Gambit! This level serves as your introduction to evading defenders and managing your stamina. Navigate the field, collect the scattered training markers, and practice taking down a few opposing players. Don't get too comfortable, though – the clock is ticking!
